name: One Stone
description:
(This was our first project for game jam practice)

One day, Boris took a rest when he was enjoying a stroll in a park. When he woke up, he realized that he has been transported to another place that only has one straight path  Armed with a slingshot and a mysterious stone he found upon waking up, he decides to follow the path and see where it goes. 

Controls:
  • Left Click | Throw your stone (be careful, they bounce wildly!)
  • W / Space | Jump
  • A / D | Change volume (+- 10)
  • Shift + A / D | Change volume (+- 1)
Credits
  • Roger Gilbert Fernandi - Game Designer
  • Angeline Cecilia - 2D Artist
  • Kensi Chandrawan - Game Designer & Programmer
  • Wilson Nathaniel - Game Programmer
  • Winson Allan Wijaya - Sound Engineer
